intro: As a Software Engineer I am trained and experienced for designing, constructing, testing and maintaining required software systems. My main focus is building fast, accessible, and beautiful apps that resolve problems and users enjoy.
You can have a look at some of my work here.
about: → ☕️ Java platforms : Java, Kotlin, SpringBoot, Spring (Data, MVC, Integration, Security, Cloud, etc)
→ 🌐 Microservices : Spring Cloud, Netflix (discovery, gateway), Keycloak (security), RabbitMQ(Message Broker), ngix (api proxy), OpenApi,
→ 🎯 Devops : Jenkins, Gitlab, Docker, Swarm, kubernetes
→ ✂️ Craft : DDD, TDD, Refactoring patterns, SOLID principales, Microservice patterns, microfrontend, Api first design, Api management Hexagonal architecture
